data.title: Pinky & The Brain, Recast: A Scene Featuring Dog God’s Brain and PK
data.meta_description: He glances over at the Dog next to him in the kennel. His mind never questioning why a shelter would put a cat and a dog together in the same cage. He stretches and approaches the dog. DG: Same thing…
data.text:
Inspired by Pinky & The Brain

(71) Pinky & The Brain Theme Song — YouTube

The scene opens on a dimly lit animal shelter in the middle of the night.

A black cat opens its night piercing yellow-green eyes, awakening from sleep.

He glances over at the Dog next to him in the kennel. His mind never questioning why a shelter would put a cat and a dog together in the same cage. He stretches and approaches the dog.

PK: What are We going to Do Tonight, God-brain?

DG: Same thing we do every night, PK (Pinko-kin, Psycho-kin, Pharma-kin, Pretty Kitty-kin). To get humanity to bow down and worship me as their One True God!

PK slowly blinked his shining yellow-green eyes. As he did, the world went dark. It always disturbed him greatly that the world went black whenever he blinked, but no one around him seemed to panic when PK used this unusual ability, so he didn’t say anything.

The Dog God sat meditating, imprisoned in this kennel…
